SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT073
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message is sent by a Test & Training user to request the system to send a sample of messages from the tank file following a predefined pattern. Message examples in the tank file are technically correct and are not intended to reflect accurate business examples.
From: User To: FIN

SystemField.Name: msg-identifier
SystemField.description:
Refers to a specific message in a tank file by means of the message-identifier, which is recorded in the first field 20 or 20C::SEME of the message. No duplicates are allowed.
Can be repeated up to 999 times.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: msg-identifier
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
Refers to a specific message in a tank file by means of the message-identifier, which is recorded in the first field 20 or 20C::SEME of the message. No duplicates are allowed.
Can be repeated up to 999 times.

SystemField.Name: msg-list
SystemField.description: Whole tank file. It should contain the value ALL, indicating that the entire set of user to user tank file messages is selected. Note that system message examples contained in the tank file will not be selected when option ALL is used. These messages must be specifically requested using field tag 124. The tank file currently contains examples of the following system messages: MT 021 Retrieved Message (Text and History) MT 066 Solicited Undelivered Message Report MT 071 Undelivered SSI Update Notification Report MT 082 Undelivered Message Report at a Fixed Hour MT 083 Undelivered Message Report at Cut-off Time MT 094 Broadcast message MT 096 FINCopy to Server Destination Message

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: msg-list
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Whole tank file. It should contain the value ALL, indicating that the entire set of tank file messages is requested.

SystemField.Name: random-number-seed
SystemField.description: Identifies a set of test messages. It contains a seed defined by the user, which allows them to receive the same set of messages in a subsequent session if the same seed is used.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: random-number-seed
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Identifies a set of test messages. It contains a seed defined by the user, which allows them to receive the same set of messages in a subsequent session if the same seed is used.

SystemField.Name: number-of-messages
SystemField.description: Number of messages requested to be sent by the system to the Test & Training logical terminal in local test mode. A maximum of 999 messages may be requested.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: number-of-messages
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Number of messages that can be requested to be sent by the system to a Test & Training LT in Local Test mode. A maximum of 999 messages may be requested.

SystemField.Name: msg-type
SystemField.description: A valid FIN user-to-user message type or one of the following message types: MT 021, MT 066, MT 071, MT 082, MT 083, or MT 094, or MT 096. These are the only system message in the tank file and can only be requested by explicit use of field 124.Field tag 124 can be repeated up to a value equal to the number of different user-to-user or system messages. No duplicates are allowed.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: msg-type
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: A valid FIN user-to-user message type or one of the following message types: MT 021, MT 066, MT 071, MT 082, MT 083, or MT 094, or MT 096. These are the only system message in the tank file and can only be requested by explicit use of field 124.Field tag 124 can be repeated up to a value equal to the number of different user-to-user or system messages. No duplicates are allowed.

SystemField.Name: random-number-seed
SystemField.description: Identifies a set of test messages. It contains a seed defined by the user, which allows them to receive the same set of messages in a subsequent session if the same seed is used.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: random-number-seed
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Identifies a set of test messages. It contains a seed defined by the user, which allows them to receive the same set of messages in a subsequent session if the same seed is used.

SystemField.Name: number-of-messages
SystemField.description: A valid FIN user-to-user message type or one of the following message types: MT 021, MT 066, MT 071, MT 082, MT 083, or MT 094, or MT 096. These are the only system message in the tank file and can only be requested by explicit use of field 124. Field tag 124 can be repeated up to a value equal to the number of different user-to-user or system messages. No duplicates are allowed.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: number-of-messages
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Number of messages that can be requested to be sent by the system to a Test & Training LT in Local Test mode. A maximum of 999 messages may be requested.

SystemField.Name: msg-category
SystemField.description:
A valid SWIFTNet FIN user-to-user Message Category. It can be repeated up to 9 times. No duplicates are allowed.
See the SWIFTStandards Message Reference Guides for more information.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: msg-category
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description:
A valid SWIFTNet FIN user-to-user Message Category. It can be repeated up to 9 times. No duplicates are allowed.
See the SWIFTStandards Message Reference Guides for more information.

SystemField.Name: random-number-seed
SystemField.description: Identifies a set of test messages. It contains a seed defined by the user, which allows them to receive the same set of messages in a subsequent session if the same seed is used.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: random-number-seed
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Identifies a set of test messages. It contains a seed defined by the user, which allows them to receive the same set of messages in a subsequent session if the same seed is used.

SystemField.Name: number-of-messages
SystemField.description: Number of messages requested to be sent by the system to the Test & Training logical terminal in local test mode. A maximum of 999 messages may be requested.

SwiftSystemFieldDef.Name: number-of-messages
SwiftSystemFieldDef.Description: Number of messages that can be requested to be sent by the system to a Test & Training LT in Local Test mode. A maximum of 999 messages may be requested.

fieldvalidation.name: E1
fieldvalidation.comment: ONLY ONE of Group 1, Group 2, Group 3 or Group 4 be present.
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "ONLY ONE of Group 1, Group 2, Group 3 or Group 4 be present."
